DOC.brief_title: Ibuprofen Versus Acetaminophen vs Their Combination Relief Musculoskeletal Pain Emergency Setting
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether combination ibuprofen acetaminophen , effective either single agent alone treat pain acute musculoskeletal injury emergency department . We hypothesize combination effective either agent alone patient present emergency department acute pain musculoskeletal injury sprain , bruise . While agent alone effective degree , many patient find complete relief often narcotic agent ( potential side effect ) add . In study patient experience pain randomly give either ibuprofen OR acetaminophen OR combination degree pain severity measure every 15 minute one hour . At end 1 hour patient still experience pain require additional pain relief receive additional analgesic discretion treat physician . We measure much pain severity reduce also percentage patient require form additional `` rescue '' medication .
